description: This file contains utility functions for safely handling file operations such as saving (with backup) and selecting which file to read, specifically in the context of configuration file management. It includes functions for renaming, deleting, checking existence, and conditionally creating directories, along with associated logging.

methods.name: safeFileSave
methods.description: Safely saves a temporary file to the desired filename by renaming and creating backups if necessary.

methods.name: chooseFileToRead
methods.description: Determines whether the original or backup configuration file can be read, or if neither exists, indicates that a new file should be created.
